original_text: And they exceeded our expectations: They gave themselves first of all to the Lord, and then by the will of God also to us.
korean_text: 우리가 바라던 것뿐 아니라 그들이 먼저 자신을 주께 드리고 또 하나님의 뜻을 따라 우리에게 주었도다

sentences.original_text: They gave themselves first of all to the Lord
and then by the will of God also to us
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 하나님의 뜻으로 또한 우리에게도 드렸습니다
